name: SelectSoma Double-Thick Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting Pressure Relief for Back, Sciatica, Coccyx, Tailbone Pain - Cushion for Office Chair, Wheelchair, Car & Truck, Patio Chairs - Egg Seat Pad
short_description: [DOUBLE-THICK SUPPORT & COMFORT] High-grade, double-thick honeycomb gel cushion provides superior pressure-relieving support and stays soft on pressure points for all-day sitting comfort!
[COOLING BREATHABLE DESIGN] Open-cell honeycomb gel boosts airflow to keep you cool and dry. Ventilated mesh cover stays temperature-neutral—no more seat sweat like with dense memory-foam cushions!

[ERGONOMIC PAIN & PRESSURE RELIEF] Supports lower-back, sciatica, tailbone, coccyx, and hip areas—helping reduce strain and numbness during long hours at the office, in the car, or at home - relieving pressure where it matters most!
[LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE] Lightweight, foldable design lets you bring lasting comfort anywhere—office chair, car seat, wheelchair, airplane, stadium, or floor seating for travel and events!

[WATER-RESISTANT + 2 WASHABLE COVERS] Durable gel cushion works indoors and outdoors—ideal for gardening, patio seating, boating, or travel. Includes BONUS second machine-washable, breathable cover with non-slip base!

[VERSATILE CUSHION FOR ALL SEATS] Great for students, gamers, professionals, seniors, or recovery use—relieves discomfort from long sitting and doubles as a supportive booster cushion in cars, at your desk, or at the table!

short_description: Help Stay Cool & Relieve Pressure: The built-in cooling gel layer effectively disperses heat, while the breathable cover improves airflow to reduce heat buildup.
